questions.question: Considering the overall shape and form of the product depicted, what best describes its primary geometry?
What is the dominant color used for the main text and branding elements on the packaging?
Based on the visible text, what specific type of vegetable is contained within the package?
What is the primary material used for the packaging of the product as shown in the image?

Focusing on the visual branding, what word or phrase indicates the brand name associated with this product?
Considering the bag's texture, what word best describes the visual appearance of its surface?
Considering the base color of the packaging, excluding text and logos, what color describes it?
